DOC.HEADLINE: ORANGE COUNTY BRIEFLY
DOC.TEXT: Winners Entertainment Inc. : The provider of video_game machines said that a West_Virginia referendum Tuesday on whether to allow electronic gambling at horse racetracks passed_by a wide margin . In the referendum , 80 % of the voters approved the machines , which offer electronic versions of keno , blackjack and draw_poker . Winners Entertainment in San Juan Capistrano has operated video gambling machines at the Mountaineer Racetrack & Resort in Hancock County , W.Va. , for almost four years . But for the past year , it has been fending off efforts to have the machines banned from the state . The company continued to operate the video gambling machines under a temporary court_order until voters had a chance to decide the issue .
